EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PCF Virtual User Group Beta_2018.Denied Feb 27 Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Regarding your February 27 EMEA PCF User Group Registration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Whoops!
We can’t confirm you at this event. It could be because the email domain you’ve used isn’t on the pre-approved list.
Here are a couple of options:
Did you use your personal email address? Make sure you’re registering with your work email address.
Are you a PCF user but not a PCF User Group member? Contact your Pivotal Account Rep or Platform Architect to find out how to join!
